markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Throw Rock](/Actions.aspx?ID=556) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The arboreal sapling Interacts to pick up a rock within reach or retrieve a stowed rock, then throws it with a ranged rock Strike that deals a base of 1d6 bludgeoning damage with a range increment of 30 feet.
name: Throw Rock
